name: Smell Ya Later
description: Brewed exclusively with Nelson Sauvin hops from our friends at Hop Revolution hop farms in New Zealand, this Hazy IPA is bursting with notes of Gooseberry, Kiwi and pepper corns. A simple grain bill of 2-row barley and flaked oats keeps things clean and soft.
tasting: Aromas of gooseberry, kiwi, and pepper corns w/ a soft mouth-feel
